name: Jump Noted
description:
This is a simple platformer, where you drag notes to jump on across the level!

Controlls

In the game you can DRAG NOTES!

Movement A, D / <--> and SpaceDragClickEdit mode / Play modeA button in UI Friday Night Game Jam

This game was made for a game jam, where you have to make a game in 3 hours. The 3-hours contain the actual development, but not the planning. 

In this jam the theme was: "Sticky Notes"
